DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the presence and manifestations of ocular graft versus host disease in adults that had hematopoietic stem cell transplantation in the past 3 years at the sheba medical center, Israel. As well as correlate the degree of the presentation to the therapeutic protocol (chemotherapy and irradiation).
DOC.brief_title: Ocular Graft Versus Host Disease After Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation in Adults
DOC.criteria: after hematopoietic stem cell transplantation done at sheba medical center Israel 3 month have past from transplantation but no more then 3 years transplantation done in the last 3 month or more than 3 years have past since
